Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6442 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.3.5-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6442 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.3.5-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ruby is earlier than 3.3.5-4, affected by CVE-2025-6442
